text:
Hey, Disney Channel.
Sky Katz here with For The Win.

Every sport has a few key moves
that are essential to the game
and football is no exception.

If you know the main moves
that happen

in pretty much
every football match,

it'll totally help you
understand the game even more.

Pearce and Miranda
headed out to the field
to learn some of the basics

that every football fan
needs to know

to really have fun watching
or playing the game.

They'll learn how to snap,
the best way to tackle,

and get some tips
on how to catch

with a little help
from the pros.

- ( shouting )
- Check it out. Check it out.
How cool is that?

I think I'm going to get them
to teach me something.

- Hold up.
- What is your technique

for snapping the ball
since you're a center?

Shotgun.
You really want to focus

on snapping the ball
to the same spot every time.

The biggest thing
is you need to practice

your moving
while you're snapping.
Always picture a play.

Can you show us how
to properly tackle somebody?

- Who you want me to tackle?
- Tackle him!

You got her.
She was the one who offered.

We can go this way.
I'll come at an angle.

- Okay.
- Same foot, same shoulder.
And I'm gonna squeeze in.

- And I'm just gonna...
- That's a good grip.

You're going to juke me.
I'm trying to tackle you.

- How are you going to do it?
- I don't juke.

I'm going to come into you
like I'm gonna juke,

- and then I'm just gonna--
- ( laughing )
He put it right in my chest.

- I don't juke it.
- Oh!

As a wide receiver,
catching the ball,

what is the most
important thing?
Can you show it to us?

Just catch it.
By any means.

With your feet,
with your hands, your helmet.

Is there a technique
you like to use?

Everybody talk about
the diamond, right?

Everybody talk about catching
the ball like this.
Widen it out a little bit.

You want to have
strong hands every time.
When the ball hits your hands,
you look it all the way through.

Secure it
and hold on to it.

No matter what,
you hold on to that football.
That was beautiful.

They're going to try to
recruit me if I stay out here.

Pearce and Miranda putting it
all out on the field.
Love it.
If you want more exclusive info
on everything sports,

For The Win
has got you covered.

Be sure to check us out
next time. See ya!
